Html: Is there a way to write the function EnumerateTransforms in MediaFoundation /MediaFoundationHelpers without using MFTEnumEx in MediaFoundation/MediaFoundationInterop?

not that I know of, but there is a way to get at transcoders in the Windows RT API (I'm assuming this is why you want to avoid MFTEnumEx)
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/windows.media.transcoding.mediatranscoder.aspx

So basically, I don't think you can enumerate them, but you might still be able to use them
